sense.name: avoid or evade
sense.examples: The twins had traded outfits as part of a plan to elude the reporter. It was smart enough to elude capture. But successful, moneymaking blogs elude most people. You may be going so fast you even elude radar. I had the sense that this missing element would forever elude me. And still some of those females manage to elude their bodygaurds. Peace and stability will continue to elude it. Elude the cops first then settle who gets the case.

sense.name: be incomprehensible
sense.examples: What you see in him eludes me. His mastery may forever elude me. Search though I do, understanding continues to elude me. That they are truely dead forever seems to elude her. This desire for esteem did not totally elude the farmers.
